title: Baked new potatoes with dressed crab & celery salad

ingredients.item: 400g large Jersey Royals or new potatoes
200g pack Waitrose Orkney Crab Layered With Egg
100g pack Seafood & Eat It Cornish White Crab
Celery salt and ground white pepper, to taste
1 pack essential Waitrose Salad Cress, cut
200g celery (roughly half a pack), washed and very finely sliced
¼ x 25g pack flat leaf parsley, very finely chopped
½ ripe avocado, stoned, peeled and sliced

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ºC, gas mark 6. Toss the potatoes with olive oil, rosemary and garlic in a roasting tin. Cook for 30 minutes, then turn before cooking for a further 15-25 minutes, until browned and tender.
Meanwhile, mix together the filling ingredients in a bowl, reserving a little of the cress for
When the potatoes are almost cooked, make the salad. Mix the lime juice, oil and some seasoning together. Toss gently with the remaining salad ingredients.
To serve, split each potato in half, top each with a generous teaspoonful of the crab filling and scatter over a little reserved cress. Serve with the salad alongside.
